text: Brij Bhasha (also known as Hariboli ) is the language in Braj region of Uttar Pradesh, Haryana and Rajasthan. Outside of the Braj, it is spoken in Madhya Pradesh. == Sources == == Other websites == * ब्रजभाषा विशेष: जानिए ब्रज की बोली का इतिहास और उसमें रचित काव्य Category:Languages of India
title: Brij Bhasha
